Uses of Package
ch.hszt.connectfour.control

Packages that use ch.hszt.connectfour.control
ch.hszt.connectfour.control Contains the controller and logic implementation of the game. 
ch.hszt.connectfour.gui Contains the presentation layer, i.e the user interface classes and customized UI objects. 
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game Contains all the classes directly linked with the game. 
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.control used by ch.hszt.connectfour.control
GameController
          Handles and delegates communication between GUI and underlying model.
GameEngine
          Encapsulates all the relevant game logic.
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.control used by ch.hszt.connectfour.gui
GameController
          Handles and delegates communication between GUI and underlying model.
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.control used by ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game
GameObserver
          This class acts as main observer of the Game and is notified about changes within the associated Game.
